casebody.data:
CHICAGO MILL & LUMBER COMPANY, a Corporation, and Walter O. Brown, Appellants, v. GRAND RAPIDS SAMPLE CASE COMPANY, a Corporation, Appellee. No. 7943. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit Nov. 16, 1939. Charles W. Hills, of Chicago, 111., for appellants. Earl & Chappell, of Kalamazoo, Mich., for appellee.

Before HICKS, SIMONS and ALLEN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This cause was heard upon the transcript of the record, briefs and argument of counsel, and upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered adjudged and decreed that the decree of dismissal herein appealed from he and the same is affirmed upon the grounds and for the reasons stated in the opinion of the District Court, 30 F.Supp. 510, filed. June 30, 1937.
